languages.text: "Этот мон-кай привлек внимание к мутанту так, что это нельзя было проигнорировать. Изощренный ход, если угроза действительно велика".

traits.locale_text: "Этот мон-кай привлек внимание к мутанту так, что это нельзя было проигнорировать. Изощренный ход, если угроза действительно велика".

languages.text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
languages.original_text: "Этот мон-кай привлек внимание к мутанту так, что это нельзя было проигнорировать. Изощренный ход, если угроза действительно велика".

traits.locale_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
"This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

languages.text: «Este mon-keigh ha llamado la atención sobre el mutante de una manera imposible de ignorar. Una táctica astuta, si la amenaza es tan grande como dice que es».
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

traits.locale_text: «Este mon-keigh ha llamado la atención sobre el mutante de una manera imposible de ignorar. Una táctica astuta, si la amenaza es tan grande como dice que es».

languages.text: 「このモン＝ケイは、これを無視することはできない方法で変異体に注目を集めた。本当に彼が考えているほどの脅威ならば、抜け目のない戦術と言える」
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

traits.locale_text: 「このモン＝ケイは、これを無視することはできない方法で変異体に注目を集めた。本当に彼が考えているほどの脅威ならば、抜け目のない戦術と言える」

languages.text: “这只猴子通过让人无法忽视的手段，引起了所有人对变种人的关注。如果那些变种人真的有那么危险，这确实是个精明的策略。”
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

traits.locale_text: “这只猴子通过让人无法忽视的手段，引起了所有人对变种人的关注。如果那些变种人真的有那么危险，这确实是个精明的策略。”

languages.text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey hat auf eine Art und Weise Aufmerksamkeit auf den Mutanten gelenkt, die nicht ignoriert werden konnte. Eine gerissene Taktik, sofern die Bedrohung wirklich so groß ist, wie er glaubt."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey hat auf eine Art und Weise Aufmerksamkeit auf den Mutanten gelenkt, die nicht ignoriert werden konnte. Eine gerissene Taktik, sofern die Bedrohung wirklich so groß ist, wie er glaubt."

languages.text: « Ce mon-keigh s'est arrangé pour que le mutant attire notre regard. Une tactique rusée s'il en est. À condition que la menace soit aussi élevée qu'il le pense. »
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."

traits.locale_text: « Ce mon-keigh s'est arrangé pour que le mutant attire notre regard. Une tactique rusée s'il en est. À condition que la menace soit aussi élevée qu'il le pense. »

languages.text: "Bu mon-keigh, yok sayılamayacak bir şekilde tüm dikkati mutantın üzerine çekti. Eğer ki tehlike, hakikaten de inandığı kadar büyükse kurnaz bir taktik kullandı."
languages.original_text: "This mon-keigh has drawn attention to the mutant in a way that could not be ignored. A shrewd tactic, if the threat is indeed as great as he believes."
